snippet: John McEnroe just wanted to win and give New York City, his hometown, a good show, but Pat Rafter stood in his way at the PowerShares Series champions tour event.
abstract: John McEnroe just wanted to win and give New York City, his hometown, a good show, but Pat Rafter stood in his way at the PowerShares Series champions tour event.

headline.main: McEnroe Returns to Madison Square Garden to Face Younger Foes
